trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Monticello
There was one other sighting in Monticello on or around June 24th 2012
Summary: a pulsating light traveling faster than comprehinsable
divs: Sighting Detailsi was having coffee on my patio on the north side of my house,when a bright pulsating silvery light streeked from north to south at a speed i have never witnessed before.thelight was visible for a few seconds before it had traveled out of eyesight.judging from the light i am only guessing it was about 500 or so feet above the ground. ihave no idea what it was ,i have seen satelites, jet fighters playing war games,falling stars, but i have never seen any thing even close to the speed that this thing was moving,and there wasn't any sound at all.
